title: FTP and SSH Misconfiguration Challenge
description: Explore FTP and SSH misconfigurations to capture the flag.
hints: Check the FTP service configuration for possible information leaks.
SSH might have a weak point - especially regarding root access.
The flag is hidden but accessible due to a common SSH misconfiguration.
learningObjectives: Understand the risks of enabling anonymous FTP access without restrictions.
Recognize the dangers of allowing root SSH login.
Learn to exploit FTP and SSH misconfigurations.
